mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msurvey(msurveyno, surveyno, memberno, surveyanswer1, surveyanswer2, surveyanswer3, surveyanswer4, surveyanswer5, surveyanswer6, etc) VALUES (msurvey_seq.nextval, #{surveyno}, #{memberno}, #{surveyanswer1}, #{surveyanswer2}, #{surveyanswer3}, #{surveyanswer4}, #{surveyanswer5}, #{surveyanswer6}, #{etc})
mapper.select: SELECT msurveyno, surveyno, memberno, surveyanswer1, surveyanswer2, surveyanswer3, surveyanswer4, surveyanswer5, surveyanswer6, etc FROM msurvey WHERE msurveyno = #{msurveyno}
